org.javautil.document.style
Class DefaultStyleParser

java.lang.Object
  org.javautil.document.style.DefaultStyleParser
All Implemented Interfaces:
StyleParser
public class DefaultStyleParser
extends Object
implements StyleParser

A default implementation of StyleParser that creates styles evaluating style definition values against enumerations and booleans. The parser will fail fast at any unexpected property value. Null style property values are allowed and considered unset. This class is named DefaultStyleParser instead of StyleParserImpl because it provides a default set of methods that can be easily overridden to add custom features to alter the style parsing process.

Author:
bcm
